title: Basics of Linguistics
sentences: How do you say this word in Spanish?
I don't understand the meaning of this sentence.
el texto del inglés al español.
You have to translate the text from English to Spanish.
This sentence is very difficult to pronounce.
Can you help me with the pronunciation of this word?
está mal conjugado en esta frase.
The verb is incorrectly conjugated in this sentence.
I have to study the vocabulary for the exam.
I look up the definition in the dictionary.
es muy natural, parece que eres de aquí.
Your accent is very natural; it seems like you are from here.
de mi nombre es la A.
The first letter of my name is A.
I made a mistake when writing this message.
Can you correct my exercises, please?
I have a question about grammar.
Your answer is correct, very well!
What level of Spanish are you in now?
Tomorrow I have a language exam.
de hoy trata sobre los verbos.
I haven't finished the Spanish homework yet.
Is it a masculine or feminine noun?
This adjective always goes after the noun.
I like to read books in their original language.
I want to understand what the natives say.
I speak Spanish but I need more fluency.
What is the synonym of this word?
entre los personajes es muy interesante.
The dialogue between the characters is very interesting.
dictionary:
La palabra - The word
El significado - The meaning
Traducir - To translate
El idioma - The language
La frase - The sentence/phrase
La pronunciación - The pronunciation
El verbo - The verb
Significar - To mean
El vocabulario - The vocabulary
El diccionario - The dictionary
El acento - The accent
El alfabeto - The alphabet
La letra - The letter
El error - The mistake
Corregir - To correct
La pregunta - The question
La respuesta - The answer
El nivel - The level
El examen - The exam/test
La lección - The lesson
La tarea - The homework
El sustantivo - The noun
El adjetivo - The adjective
Escribir - To write
Leer - To read
Entender - To understand
La fluidez - The fluency
El sinónimo - The synonym
El antónimo - The antonym
El diálogo - The dialogue
